key: << Keyword for the Connector that can be used in searching: ex. Amazon Comprehend >>
componentId: << Unique identifier of the connector: ex. amazon-comprehend >>
name: << Full Name of the Connector: ex. CXF Amazon Comprehend >>
description: << Description of the connector: ex. This connector uses AWS comprehend to analyze a message >>
customFunctions: << an array of function names that can be found in the customfunctions.js file. ex. customfunction1 >>

dataInsideAction.label: << visible text label of the connector >>
